content:
<rule id="azure-aws-config-sqs-04002" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>                 
                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="sqs" groupId="software.amazon.awssdk"/>
                </project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="3" title="Amazon Simple Queue Service Java 2.x SDK dependency">
                    <message>
                         The application contains dependencies for Amazon Simple Queue Service by using the AWS SDK Java 2.x. Consider using Azure Service Bus by Java SDK instead. 

                         * **Replace AWS SDK dependency**: Update the Java application's dependencies to include the Azure Service Bus client libraries and APIs (com.azure.azure-sdk-bom and com.azure.azure-messaging-servicebus). Remove the AWS SDK Java 2.x dependency and add the Azure SDK for Java dependency to interact with Azure Service Bus.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/service-bus-messaging" title="Azure Service Bus documentation"/>
                    <link href="https://learn.microsoft.com/java/api/overview/azure/service-bus" title="Azure Service Bus libraries for Java"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
